channel.title: My Work on Ed Leonardy
channel.description: Recent content in My Work on Ed Leonardy

item.title: Dian Harapan Yearbook
item.description: Private school high school yearbooks in Indonesia often differ quite a bit from the conventional yearbooks. Each student is to have a whole page spread of their name and photo–and I got to shoot some for a couple students. These students’ class also wanted to have one extra page for a class photo. We went with a rooftop shot with all 26 students. Final design Guys Girls

item.title: TICDA
item.description: My very first sponsored project! The first part of the shoot is heavily inspired from product photography pages I see on Instagram with incredible setups so I attempted a DIY shoot with fake grass from my dad’s koi pond and his fishing line to suspend the armband! A few sprinkles of water later I got the shot and I guess that day ‘I could do anything’ (TICDA hehe) The second part of the shoot was an outdoor shoot since the brand also focuses on fitness and health motivation.
